title: Education loans to remain among fastest-growing segments for NBFCs: Crisil
description: Education loans for overseas courses are set to grow rapidly for non-banking financial companies (NBFCs) due to increasing demand for higher education. Crisil Ratings projects a 40-45% rise in assets under management, reaching over Rs 60,000 crore this fiscal. Despite country-specific concerns, asset quality remains stable.
